title: Tobavarchkhili (Silver Lake)
about: The lake Tobavarchkhili is located in Samegrelo-Zemo Svaneti on Egrisi range at 2650 MSL. Tobavarchkhili is the biggest lake from the lakes on the Egrisi range. The lake is the source of the river Magana, which creates beautiful canyon near the lake. there are three nearby lakes: Didgalish Tob, Kalalish Toba and Tsakatskarish Toba.
